## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as openstack from "@pulumi/openstack";

const volume1 = new openstack.blockstorage.Volume("volume_1", {
    description: "first test volume",
    region: "RegionOne",
    size: 3,
});
```

## Volume Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) in the Programming Model docs.

### Inputs

The Volume resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:





<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The size of the volume to create (in gigabytes).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Availability<wbr>Zone</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The availability zone for the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Consistency<wbr>Group<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The consistency group to place the volume
in.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A description of the volume. Changing this updates
the volume's description.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Enable<wbr>Online<wbr>Resize</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>When this option is set it allows extending
attached volumes. Note: updating size of an attached volume requires Cinder
support for version 3.42 and a compatible storage driver.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Image<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The image ID from which to create the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Metadata</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, object&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Metadata key/value pairs to associate with the volume.
Changing this updates the existing volume metadata.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Multiattach</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Allow the volume to be attached to more than one Compute instance.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A unique name for the volume. Changing this updates the
volume's name.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Region</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The region in which to create the volume. If
omitted, the `region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this
creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Snapshot<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The snapshot ID from which to create the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Source<wbr>Replica</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The volume ID to replicate with.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Source<wbr>Vol<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The volume ID from which to create the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Volume<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The type of volume to create.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

</dl>

    <dd>The volume ID from which to create the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>volume<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The type of volume to create.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

</dl>




<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The size of the volume to create (in gigabytes).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>availability_<wbr>zone</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The availability zone for the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>consistency_<wbr>group_<wbr>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The consistency group to place the volume
in.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A description of the volume. Changing this updates
the volume's description.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>enable_<wbr>online_<wbr>resize</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>When this option is set it allows extending
attached volumes. Note: updating size of an attached volume requires Cinder
support for version 3.42 and a compatible storage driver.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>image_<wbr>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The image ID from which to create the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>metadata</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dict[str, Any]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Metadata key/value pairs to associate with the volume.
Changing this updates the existing volume metadata.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>multiattach</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Allow the volume to be attached to more than one Compute instance.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A unique name for the volume. Changing this updates the
volume's name.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>region</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The region in which to create the volume. If
omitted, the `region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this
creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>snapshot_<wbr>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The snapshot ID from which to create the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>source_<wbr>replica</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>

</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>source_<wbr>vol_<wbr>id</span>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The volume ID from which to create the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>volume_<wbr>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>

Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

</dl>

            title="Optional">
        <span>Metadata</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">map[string]interface{}</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Metadata key/value pairs to associate with the volume.
Changing this updates the existing volume metadata.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Multiattach</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#boolean">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Allow the volume to be attached to more than one Compute instance.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A unique name for the volume. Changing this updates the
volume's name.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Region</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The region in which to create the volume. If
omitted, the `region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this
creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#integer">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The size of the volume to create (in gigabytes).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Snapshot<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The snapshot ID from which to create the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Source<wbr>Replica</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The volume ID to replicate with.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Source<wbr>Vol<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The volume ID from which to create the volume.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Volume<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The type of volume to create.
Changing this creates a new volume.
</dd>

</dl>
